texto: Technical Barriers to Trade (TBT), see www​.iso​.org/​ iso/​foreword​.html. This document was prepared by Technical Committee ISO/TC 176, Quality management and quality assurance, Subcommittee SC 3, Supporting technologies. This first edition of ISO 10017 cancels and replaces ISO/TR 10017:2003, which has been technically revised. The main changes compared with ISO/TR 10017:2003 are as follows: — it has been revised as a full guidance document and aligned with ISO 9001:2015. Any feedback or questions on this document should be directed to the user’s national standards body. A complete listing of these bodies can be found at www​.iso​.org/​members​.html. © ISO 2021 – All rights reserved  ﻿ v
